full_text: RT @uidahoextension: @uidaho has received a $199,974 grant from @USDA_NIFA for a new study to investigate the links between pollutant conce…

@uidaho has received a $199,974 grant from @USDA_NIFA for a new study to investigate the links between pollutant concentrations and agricultural practices. The goal is to provide incentives that improve environmental health without placing undue burden on farmers. #NIFAimpacts
